channel.title: No Paladin in Cult Game
channel.description:
#### What happened?
![temp|690x388](upload://jPtYEGFPSFKADHSDJBHBvbFL5jO.jpg)
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
At least if the wiki is correct, there should always be a paladin guaranteed in Cult games.
http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/Classes
" Certain classes will be present in every game. These are: The King, The Prince, The Mastermind/The Cult Leader, The Assassin/The Seeker/The Ritualist/The Invoker and The Sheriff/The Paladin."
#### Comments:
I honestly don't know if this is an actual bug, or just the wiki being out of date or incorrect.

item.title: No Paladin in Cult Game
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
That article in the wiki is out of date. It used to be a guaranteed spawn in Cult games, but not anymore since the class was made convertible and non-unique.
Thank you for bringing it to our attention, the article will be fixed.

Read full topic
